title: Amelia's Story
description: This is a true story of Amelia's harrowing journey through her childhood. All she needs to do is survive through to adulthood, then her destiny will be in her own hands. This is a powerful portrayal of the life of a child subjected to the care system and her desperate struggle to be free. Amelia has but one wish and that is to survive each day, but the obstacles placed before her are proving too much to bare. Amelia starts to wonder about the peace and finality of her own death.
author: D.G. Torrens
